description:
A trekking pack for fully loaded backcountry adventures. The lid converts to a waist pack, so you can bring a few items on side trips. Two full-length watertight zippers allow quick access to the main compartment. For cold outings, there's room to bring your warmest layers. In summer, you can haul a week-long menu of backcountry dinners and desserts.

  • 100-denier ripstop nylon fabric and reinforced base, with DWR coating
  • Endurance Yoke breathable back panel slides up or down for a customized fit
  • Two full-length watertight YKK® zippers access the front main compartment
  • Removeable lid doubles as a hip sack
  • Adjustable shoulder and sternum straps
  • Stretch shoulder pockets for water bottles or snacks
  • Adjustable padded hipbelt with 2 zippered pockets
  • Speed Zip™ sleeping bag compartment
  • Dual tool attachments
  • Trekking pole attachments
  • Compression straps trim and stabilize the load
  • Daisy chains for lashing gear
  • Hydration compatible (sold separately)
name: Mystery Ranch Bridger 65 Backpack - Women's
